title: How can we live hundreds of lives in one life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you know this one life ? You may say, yes i know. If you say yes, Then i will say definitely you don’t know anything about it. If you have known, this question won't be asked here. This is not simple question which can be answered by anyone, even those who can they will also laugh and leave you with your question. If you are willing to know this one life in its full depth and dimension you should stop believing that you know anything about it. This single life is the basis of our body and all physical forms and life whether known or unknown, manifested or unmanifested around us. To know this one life it requires your time and life and constant pursuit of seeking truth and above all grace. Without realising immensity of one life thinking about hundred life is nothing more than your imagination. This one contains billions life within or billions and one are the one and same. It is upon you whether you seek it or not.

I think we do that almost every day. You are a different person talking yo your parents, an entirely different person with your siblings and similarly to every person you have a conversation for 10–15 mins ot more, you live a different life as you attribute yourself with different names. Same is the case with the things you do, when you are drawing you are an artist, while studying you are a student.  According to me the question should be “how” should we live 100s of lives. The answer would be with immense gratitude and self-expression. Talk to new interesting people, do new awesome things, learn music, art, dance, programming, maths, physics, banking, what ever you feel like doing. Hundreds of live all fun, satisfying and most importantly worth spending your life. Do what your gut says! And what ever problems arrive your way logically figure them out. Life's Fun!

In a few lines, here’s my answer. Help people.Expect nothing.Create more and more value the life of those you know.Be thankful about all your joys.Life is a series of character you will play at different times, make sure you got your heart at the right spot throughout the journey and it will be larger than life. Much love. Left Handed Author

If you try to, your life would literally be “all over the place.” There is no use of living hundreds of lives in one life. Our life is our life. Let us give it a proper direction and make decisions wisely.

By helping others who are in need of help. By adding some value and happiness in other people lives. You take name of any great person of the world who has lived a great life, they have helped others in some form for sure. Eg- Mother Teresa, Saheed Bhagat Singh, Nelson Mandela, swami Vivekanand
By doing something big which one won't be able to do even after hundred lives , work hard , don't think much.
